txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Great scales from the worms surrounding the dwarf-home of Zigilgund. Deliver the items to Fotri, overseer of the settlement.
'It will take a while to cure these, so we had better get to the process. Thank you.'
'Scales from the worms have many uses. Always best to be prepared.'
Fotri, overseer of the dwarves of Forochel, awaits the delivery of great scales at the dwarf-home of Zigilgund.
Deliver the great scales to Fotri at Zigilgund in Forochel
You have accepted a task to collect and deliver great scales from the worms surrounding Zigilgund in Forochel. The items are to be delivered to the dwarf-overseer Fotri encamped at the dwarf-home.
Wanted: Great scales from the worms surrounding the dwarf-home of Zigilgund.
